name: naggingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an unpleasant or annoying way that continues for a long period of time: At first I was happy, but most of the time I was naggingly unhappy.naggingly familiar The song was naggingly familiar, but I couldn't remember where I'd heard it before.
More examplesFewer examplesThe film's naggingly catchy theme song became famous all over the world.I found the film naggingly unsatisfying.There's something naggingly false about this story.It's a song that lingers naggingly in your head.
